Contact Us Feel free to leave us a message. Name* Phone Number* Email* Message SEND IT

Enter valid email address

Thank you for contacting us. We will respond to you soon.

Let's Party Book Private Party Book Your Event! Complete the information below. Name* Phone Number* Email* Event Date* Attendees* Occasion Message SEND IT

Enter valid email address

Thank you for your inquiry. Someone will be reaching out to you soon! FAQs Most commonly asked questions for 'Booking a Private Event' Where is the private party space? It is located in our back room, we have doors that close it off from the main space. What does the private space come with? There is a full bar with 10 seats, tables that can seat up to 40+, separate elevated area for buffet set up, dedicated stage and private bathrooms. Do you offer food & drink packages? Yes, please contact nicole.irishbrigade@gmail.com for pricing, menus and availability. What is the max capacity? 75 Is there a minimum spend to rent the space? Yes, the minimum varies and can be reviewed with your event planner. What is the deposit? We require 30% down and a 20% gratuity.

About Irish Brigade Inspired by the Notre Dame Fighting Irish and having a shared Irish heritage, the American restaurant owners wanted to name their Irish pub in a way that would bring those two passions together. After many nights of research finishing off their favorite whiskey bottles...They finally came to a conclusion and chose to name their establishment the Irish Brigade after a group of Irish American soldiers in the American Civil War that was known for their courage, ferocity, and toughness in battle.

When the owners set out to create the city’s newest Irish pub, the aim was simple — offer a great selection of drinks paired with quality food in a relaxed, friendly atmosphere filled with live music every weekend.

When the owners set out to create the city’s newest Irish pub, the aim was simple — offer a great selection of drinks paired with quality food in a relaxed, friendly atmosphere filled with live music every weekend. Located at 621 Lake Ave, Lake Worth, Florida The Irish Brigade has many libations including a large selection of Irish whiskeys and over 20 beers on tap with several local Florida craft beers. The Irish Brigade is Lake Worth’s best place to get dishes such as Shepherd’s Pie, Bangers and Mash, and Fish N’ Chips — all made in-house . The Irish Brigade values authenticity, using Irish-owned businesses whenever possible. gps watches The heart of the Brigade lies with music and providing a venue for patrons to listen to live musicians every weekend (Thursday-Sunday) featuring only the best artists southern Florida has to offer. The Irish Brigade hosts a wide array of talents from aspiring singers and songwriters to Grammy Award-winning artists. With 27 large HGTV screens throughout, the Irish Brigade is the ideal place to watch your favorite sporting events. Enjoy the perfect pint of Guinness or kick back with a glass of wine on our outdoor patio and cheer on local teams. You can also watch big International Sports covering everything from 6 Nations Rugby to European Soccer Matches. Whether you are straight from the Emerald Isle or have never left Florida, we welcome you to join us for brilliant food, deadly drinks, and good craic! Guinness Official Partner
